column4: BRIEF-Coresite Announces Amended And Expanded Credit Facility Increasing Total Borrowing Capacity To $1.05 Bln
column6: * CORESITE ANNOUNCES AMENDED AND EXPANDED CREDIT FACILITY INCREASING TOTAL BORROWING CAPACITY TO $1.05 BILLION
column7: * CORESITE REALTY CORP - AMENDMENT AND EXPANSION INCREASES REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY BY AN INCREMENTAL $100 MILLION OF BORROWING CAPACITY, TO $450 MILLION
column8: * CORESITE REALTY CORP - AMENDMENT AND EXPANSION EXTENDS PRIMARY TERM OF FACILITY TO APRIL 2022, WITH A ONE-YEAR EXTENSION OPTION
column9: * CORESITE REALTY CORP - ENTERED INTO A NEW FIVE-YEAR, $150 MILLION TERM LOAN UNDER AMENDED CREDIT FACILITY
column10: * CORESITE REALTY CORP - NEW $150 TERM LOAN MATURES IN APRIL 2023, AND BEARS INTEREST AT A VARIABLE RATE OF LIBOR PLUS 140 BASIS POINTS
column11: * CORESITE REALTY CORP - PROCEEDS OF NEW TERM LOAN TO BE USED TO PAY DOWN PORTION OF CURRENT REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY BALANCE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
